comments:

Hello Ralf, 
If you could provide a test case so we can reproduce the problem, that would be a great help. Thanks

Unfortunately we can't progress this without a testcase. Please reopen if/when you can provide one - or at the very least the aspect and your .project and .classpath files, and the stack trace from running with the latest development build.
